overview:
Jeffrey M. Hurst is a general partner and a co-founder of Commonwealth Capital Ventures.

Before co-founding Commonwealth in 1995, Jeff was a senior vice president with GE Capitalâ€™s Corporate Finance Group. Jeff previously served as a managing partner of Cox Partners, a private equity firm, after starting his career with Bankers Trust Company.

Jeff earned a BA in History and Economics from Duke University and an MBA from Tulane University. Jeff is also a member of the Trinity College Board of Visitors of Duke University.

Current Investments

* BBN Technologies
* ByAllAccounts
* Copanion
* Crossbeam Systems
* First Coverage
* Seahorse
* Swissray
* Tungle
* Visible Assets

Selected Prior Investments

* American Internet Corp. (Acquired by Cisco Systems)
* NBX (Acquired by 3COM)
* Neurometrix (NASDAQ: NURO)
* The MacGregor Group (Acquired by Investment Technology Group)
